title: Drinks
name: Drinks
description:
A Map by Indirectlylit

places to drink

properties.name: Bar 4
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit444 7th Ave, Brooklyn NYFoosball, couches, and a younger park slope crowd. Small stage with open mic night and local artists.

properties.name: Barbès
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit376 9th St, Brooklyn NYSmall slope spot with a *really* small music space in back. Good whiskey selection.

properties.name: Brooklyn Social
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit 335 Smith St, Brooklyn NYCool spot, a bit on the pricey side. Great mixed drinks, and professional bartenders. Generally a cool crowd, but somehow a tough place to mingle. The pool table is too small.

properties.name: Denny's Steak Pub
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit McDonald and Church ave, brooklyn nyLocal crowd. Pool. No steak.

properties.name: Gowanus Yacht Club
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit 323 Smith St, Brooklyn NYSeasonal outdoor beer patio. Cheap drinks. Stick to the hot dogs over the burgers. Great place on a summer afternoon.

properties.name: Loki Lounge
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit304 5th ave, Brooklyn NY

properties.name: Magnetic Field
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit97 Atlantic Ave, Brooklyn NY

properties.name: Mama's Bar
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit34 Ave. B, New York, NY

properties.name: Max Fish
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit 178 Ludlow St, New York, NYLarger, well-lit bar with a mixed crowd. This is about as much of a dive as there is in the LES. Active, competitive pool table.

properties.name: Milady's Bar & Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit  162 Prince St, New YorkSmall place with a pool table, bar, and tables. They have tater tots! Varied, social crowd.

properties.name: Nancy Whiskey
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit1 Lispenard st, new yorkCheap drinks and a regular crowd of shuffleboard aficionados.

properties.name: Sophie's
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit 507 E Fifth St, New York, NY Gritty dive with an active pool table and a good jukebox.

properties.name: Union Hall
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit702 Union St. and 5th Ave, Brooklyn NYLarge place with Bocce and apparently live music downstairs (though I haven\'t been to a show)

properties.name: Vbar
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit225 Sullivan St, New York NYDark, pleasant wine bar with communal tables. Good selection, and tasty but sparse cheese plates.

properties.name: Vol De Nuit
properties.description: Posted by Indirectlylit 148 W 4th St, 10012Belgian Beer Bar. Relatively large, with a small outdoor court and a smaller bar adjacent. Might be a good place to go with a group of people.
